name: Pegz
description:
Welcome to the 2018 edition of Pegz. Featuring a faster and smoother user interface along with more refined gameplay, the 2018 edition celebrates 15 years of ZingMagic bringing you the best in board, card and puzzle games.

Pegz contains 4 games in 1, allowing you to play on either the traditional British or European boards, the popular Triangular board or on one of the 50 shaped boards.

At the start of game a number of pieces are positioned at on the board. Turns consist of the player moving a single piece from one square to another. The piece can only be moved to a vacant square. On route the piece must jump an adjacent piece. The piece that is jumped is removed from the board.

The game continues until there are no more moves possible. If you have removed all but one piece from the board you have won the game. For the British, European and Triangular boards if the single remaining piece occupies the originally vacant central board square you have played a perfect game.

For the shaped board games, a board is chosen at random from the built in set of around 50 boards. The board is populated with pieces from a randomly generated but solvable game. The number of pieces placed is dependant on the level of play chosen. This produces an unlimited set of games ranging from easy to hard to keep you on your toes.

Game features:
* Three classic boards
* Around 50 shaped boards
* Easy, medium and hard levels of play on the shaped boards.
* Unlimited game variations on the shaped boards
* Superb graphics and piece animation.
* Choice of boards and pieces sets
* Animated display of shaped board solutions.
* Unlimited undo on all boards.

Privacy info:
Please note that this game ad-funded. We generate some income to pay for the support and development of the game from advertising. The advertising and social media services use anonymous device identifiers, local storage and cookies. By downloading and continuing to use this game you consent to this information being collected and shared with our advertising and social media partners.

You can choose to remove the adverts via the built in IAP.
